impacts.gps: Slightly elevated risk due to southward Bz — Significant errors & dropouts possible; favor multi-constellation + dual-frequency
impacts.comms: Polar HF more variable — HF blackouts and GNSS scintillation likely at high/mid latitudes
impacts.grids: Geomagnetically induced currents possible; operators may see alarms
impacts.aurora: Enhanced if sustained — Likely far south from usual; widespread visibility
